info.name: Universal-POS
info.description:
Note
---

In-progress live api for the Universal POS project.

Make sure to choose your Langauge ("curl", ...) and your environment ("Universal POS DEV", ...) in the top-right corner

Possible Status Codes
----

- `HTTP 200` : ok
- `HTTP 301` : not modified (ETag / If-None-Match)
- `HTTP 400` : recoverable error with body `{'code': Int, 'message': String}`
- `HTTP 401` : Unauthorized, your `Authentification` header is not present or invalid
- `HTTP 500` : non-recoverable error


Links
----

- [Github](https://github.com/smartmobilefactory/universal-pos-webapp)
- [Postman Documentation](https://documenter.getpostman.com/collection/view/28426-cf9271d1-5762-62ec-e14c-4ef46b001c68)
- [Confluence](https://smartmobilefactory.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/UNIVERSALPOS/pages)
- [JIRA](https://smartmobilefactory.atlassian.net/projects/UNIPOSBACK/issues?filter=allopenissues)
- [Jenkins](http://ci.smfhq.com/view/Universal%20POS/)
- [Insights Sensio Labs](https://insight.sensiolabs.com/projects/4d273094-657e-4158-9f7c-1bee69d9a69d)
- [Flynn DEV](https://dashboard.flynn.smfhq.com/apps/df7808f5-67e4-4d5c-b0c1-e7234498624f) - [Flynn STAGING](https://dashboard.flynn.smfhq.com/apps/33cc1622-a140-470d-9ae4-b2f5010eb107) - [Flynn LIVE](https://dashboard.flynn.smfhq.com/apps/9fa484ff-37e0-4c9a-8748-d5d7da86c077)
- [Sentry DEV](https://sentry.solutions.smfhq.com/smf/universal-pos-backend-dev/) - [Sentry STAGING](https://sentry.solutions.smfhq.com/smf/universal-pos-backend-staging/) - [Sentry PRODUCTION](https://sentry.solutions.smfhq.com/smf/universal-pos-backend-production/)

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Keep-Alive
header.description: Custom header

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)
